name: Puzzle Animals for Kids
description:
Welcome to Puzzle Animals world! The exact place to assist in the development and
teaching of your children, 10 different Animals Puzzles - ladybug, dog, chicken, hen, cow, sheep, seal, pig, horse, elephant. We believe that the best way to teach children is
having fun.

Features:
6 different languages and pronunciations - English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish and Italian.
Child safe in-app environment.
Natural puzzle dynamics.
High-quality graphics.
Sweet background music.
Drag & drop animations

To get a better result, play with your children and make questions about the
game, such as:
- What animal is this?
- What sound does this animal do?
- What part of animal is this?
- How many pieces are missing?

We took care of every detail so that your children can develop coordination
psychomotor, recognize patterns in different ways and adapt to different
languages, written and heard.
